categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: An officer was an Imperial officer in the Imperial Army. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, the officer was part of a small Imperial task force sent to the remote planet of Gibbela to conquer the planet for the Empire. Expecting little resistance, the taskforce landed in a Sentinel-class landing craft in the middle of a native's crops. The officer and several stormtroopers disembarked the shuttle and confronted a small, weak farmer, demanding surrender from the farmer. Angered by the Imperial's intrusion, the farmer transformed into a large, claw creature and attacked the Imperial troops, killing them all.
